POUND.name: POUND
POUND.description:
Pounds the foe with
forelegs or tail.

KARATE_CHOP.name: KARATE CHOP
KARATE_CHOP.description:
A chopping attack with a
high critical-hit ratio.

DOUBLE_SLAP.name: DOUBLESLAP
DOUBLE_SLAP.description:
Repeatedly slaps the foe
2 to 5 times.

COMET_PUNCH.name: COMET PUNCH
COMET_PUNCH.description:
Repeatedly punches the foe
2 to 5 times.

MEGA_PUNCH.name: MEGA PUNCH
MEGA_PUNCH.description:
A strong punch thrown with
incredible power.

PAY_DAY.name: PAY DAY
PAY_DAY.description:
Throws coins at the foe.
Money is recovered after.

FIRE_PUNCH.name: FIRE PUNCH
FIRE_PUNCH.description:
A fiery punch that may burn
the foe.

ICE_PUNCH.name: ICE PUNCH
ICE_PUNCH.description:
An icy punch that may
freeze the foe.

THUNDER_PUNCH.name: THUNDERPUNCH
THUNDER_PUNCH.description:
An electrified punch that
may paralyze the foe.

SCRATCH.name: SCRATCH
SCRATCH.description:
Scratches the foe with
sharp claws.

VICE_GRIP.name: VICEGRIP
VICE_GRIP.description:
Grips the foe with large and
powerful pincers.

GUILLOTINE.name: GUILLOTINE
GUILLOTINE.description:
A powerful pincer attack
that may cause fainting.

RAZOR_WIND.name: RAZOR WIND
RAZOR_WIND.description:
A 2-turn move that strikes
the foe on the 2nd turn.

SWORDS_DANCE.name: SWORDS DANCE
SWORDS_DANCE.description:
A fighting dance that
sharply raises ATTACK.

CUT.name: CUT
CUT.description:
Cuts the foe with sharp
scythes, claws, etc.

GUST.name: GUST
GUST.description:
Strikes the foe with a gust
of wind whipped up by wings.

WING_ATTACK.name: WING ATTACK
WING_ATTACK.description:
Strikes the foe with wings
spread wide.

WHIRLWIND.name: WHIRLWIND
WHIRLWIND.description:
Blows away the foe with
wind and ends the battle.

FLY.name: FLY
FLY.description:
Flies up on the first turn,
then strikes the next turn.

BIND.name: BIND
BIND.description:
Binds and squeezes the foe
for 2 to 5 turns.

SLAM.name: SLAM
SLAM.description:
Slams the foe with a long
tail, vine, etc.

VINE_WHIP.name: VINE WHIP
VINE_WHIP.description:
Strikes the foe with
slender, whiplike vines.

STOMP.name: STOMP
STOMP.description:
Stomps the enemy with a big
foot. May cause flinching.

DOUBLE_KICK.name: DOUBLE KICK
DOUBLE_KICK.description:
A double-kicking attack
that strikes the foe twice.

MEGA_KICK.name: MEGA KICK
MEGA_KICK.description:
An extremely powerful kick
with intense force.

JUMP_KICK.name: JUMP KICK
JUMP_KICK.description:
A strong jumping kick. May
miss and hurt the kicker.

ROLLING_KICK.name: ROLLING KICK
ROLLING_KICK.description:
A fast kick delivered from
a rapid spin.

SAND_ATTACK.name: SAND-ATTACK
SAND_ATTACK.description:
Reduces the foe's accuracy
by hurling sand in its face.

HEADBUTT.name: HEADBUTT
HEADBUTT.description:
A ramming attack that may
cause flinching.

HORN_ATTACK.name: HORN ATTACK
HORN_ATTACK.description:
Jabs the foe with sharp
horns.

FURY_ATTACK.name: FURY ATTACK
FURY_ATTACK.description:
Jabs the foe 2 to 5 times
with sharp horns, etc.

HORN_DRILL.name: HORN DRILL
HORN_DRILL.description:
A one-hit KO attack that
uses a horn like a drill.

TACKLE.name: TACKLE
TACKLE.description:
Charges the foe with a full-
body tackle.

BODY_SLAM.name: BODY SLAM
BODY_SLAM.description:
A full-body slam that may
cause paralysis.

WRAP.name: WRAP
WRAP.description:
Wraps and squeezes the foe
2 to 5 times with vines, etc.

TAKE_DOWN.name: TAKE DOWN
TAKE_DOWN.description:
A reckless charge attack
that also hurts the user.

THRASH.name: THRASH
THRASH.description:
A rampage of 2 to 3 turns
that confuses the user.

DOUBLE_EDGE.name: DOUBLE-EDGE
DOUBLE_EDGE.description:
A life-risking tackle that
also hurts the user.

TAIL_WHIP.name: TAIL WHIP
TAIL_WHIP.description:
Wags the tail to lower the
foe's DEFENSE.

POISON_STING.name: POISON STING
POISON_STING.description:
A toxic attack with barbs,
etc., that may poison.

TWINEEDLE.name: TWINEEDLE
TWINEEDLE.description:
Stingers on the forelegs
jab the foe twice.

PIN_MISSILE.name: PIN MISSILE
PIN_MISSILE.description:
Sharp pins are fired to
strike 2 to 5 times.

LEER.name: LEER
LEER.description:
Frightens the foe with a
leer to lower DEFENSE.

BITE.name: BITE
BITE.description:
Bites with vicious fangs.
May cause flinching.

GROWL.name: GROWL
GROWL.description:
Growls cutely to reduce the
foe's ATTACK.

ROAR.name: ROAR
ROAR.description:
Makes the foe flee to end
the battle.

SING.name: SING
SING.description:
A soothing song lulls the
foe into a deep slumber.

SUPERSONIC.name: SUPERSONIC
SUPERSONIC.description:
Emits bizarre sound waves
that may confuse the foe.

SONIC_BOOM.name: SONICBOOM
SONIC_BOOM.description:
Launches shock waves that
always inflict 20 HP damage.

DISABLE.name: DISABLE
DISABLE.description:
Psychically disables one of
the foe's moves.

ACID.name: ACID
ACID.description:
Sprays a hide-melting acid.
May lower DEFENSE.

EMBER.name: EMBER
EMBER.description:
A weak fire attack that may
inflict a burn.

FLAMETHROWER.name: FLAMETHROWER
FLAMETHROWER.description:
A powerful fire attack that
may inflict a burn.

MIST.name: MIST
MIST.description:
Creates a mist that stops
reduction of abilities.

WATER_GUN.name: WATER GUN
WATER_GUN.description:
Squirts water to attack
the foe.

HYDRO_PUMP.name: HYDRO PUMP
HYDRO_PUMP.description:
Blasts water at high power
to strike the foe.

SURF.name: SURF
SURF.description:
Creates a huge wave, then
crashes it down on the foe.

ICE_BEAM.name: ICE BEAM
ICE_BEAM.description:
Blasts the foe with an icy
beam that may freeze it.

BLIZZARD.name: BLIZZARD
BLIZZARD.description:
Hits the foe with an icy
storm that may freeze it.

PSYBEAM.name: PSYBEAM
PSYBEAM.description:
Fires a peculiar ray that
may confuse the foe.

BUBBLE_BEAM.name: BUBBLEBEAM
BUBBLE_BEAM.description:
Forcefully sprays bubbles
that may lower SPEED.

AURORA_BEAM.name: AURORA BEAM
AURORA_BEAM.description:
Fires a rainbow-colored
beam that may lower ATTACK.

HYPER_BEAM.name: HYPER BEAM
HYPER_BEAM.description:
Powerful, but leaves the
user immobile the next turn.

PECK.name: PECK
PECK.description:
Attacks the foe with a
jabbing beak, etc.

DRILL_PECK.name: DRILL PECK
DRILL_PECK.description:
A corkscrewing attack with
the beak acting as a drill.

SUBMISSION.name: SUBMISSION
SUBMISSION.description:
A reckless body slam that
also hurts the user.

LOW_KICK.name: LOW KICK
LOW_KICK.description:
A kick that inflicts more
damage on heavier foes.

COUNTER.name: COUNTER
COUNTER.description:
Retaliates any physical hit
with double the power.

SEISMIC_TOSS.name: SEISMIC TOSS
SEISMIC_TOSS.description:
Inflicts damage identical
to the user's level.

STRENGTH.name: STRENGTH
STRENGTH.description:
Builds enormous power,
then slams the foe.

ABSORB.name: ABSORB
ABSORB.description:
An attack that absorbs
half the damage inflicted.

MEGA_DRAIN.name: MEGA DRAIN
MEGA_DRAIN.description:
An attack that absorbs
half the damage inflicted.

LEECH_SEED.name: LEECH SEED
LEECH_SEED.description:
Plants a seed on the foe to
steal HP on every turn.

GROWTH.name: GROWTH
GROWTH.description:
Forces the body to grow
and heightens SP. ATK.

RAZOR_LEAF.name: RAZOR LEAF
RAZOR_LEAF.description:
Cuts the enemy with leaves.
High critical-hit ratio.

SOLAR_BEAM.name: SOLARBEAM
SOLAR_BEAM.description:
Absorbs light in one turn,
then attacks next turn.

POISON_POWDER.name: POISONPOWDER
POISON_POWDER.description:
Scatters a toxic powder
that may poison the foe.

STUN_SPORE.name: STUN SPORE
STUN_SPORE.description:
Scatters a powder that may
paralyze the foe.

SLEEP_POWDER.name: SLEEP POWDER
SLEEP_POWDER.description:
Scatters a powder that may
cause the foe to sleep.

PETAL_DANCE.name: PETAL DANCE
PETAL_DANCE.description:
A rampage of 2 to 3 turns
that confuses the user.

STRING_SHOT.name: STRING SHOT
STRING_SHOT.description:
Binds the foe with string
to reduce its SPEED.

DRAGON_RAGE.name: DRAGON RAGE
DRAGON_RAGE.description:
Launches shock waves that
always inflict 40 HP damage.

FIRE_SPIN.name: FIRE SPIN
FIRE_SPIN.description:
Traps the foe in a ring of
fire for 2 to 5 turns.

THUNDER_SHOCK.name: THUNDERSHOCK
THUNDER_SHOCK.description:
An electrical attack that
may paralyze the foe.

THUNDERBOLT.name: THUNDERBOLT
THUNDERBOLT.description:
A strong electrical attack
that may paralyze the foe.

THUNDER_WAVE.name: THUNDER WAVE
THUNDER_WAVE.description:
A weak jolt of electricity
that paralyzes the foe.

THUNDER.name: THUNDER
THUNDER.description:
A lightning attack that may
cause paralysis.

ROCK_THROW.name: ROCK THROW
ROCK_THROW.description:
Throws small rocks to
strike the foe.

EARTHQUAKE.name: EARTHQUAKE
EARTHQUAKE.description:
A powerful quake, but has
no effect on flying foes.

FISSURE.name: FISSURE
FISSURE.description:
A one-hit KO move that
drops the foe in a fissure.

DIG.name: DIG
DIG.description:
Digs underground the first
turn and strikes next turn.

TOXIC.name: TOXIC
TOXIC.description:
Poisons the foe with an
intensifying toxin.

CONFUSION.name: CONFUSION
CONFUSION.description:
A psychic attack that may
cause confusion.

PSYCHIC.name: PSYCHIC
PSYCHIC.description:
A powerful psychic attack
that may lower SP. DEF.

HYPNOSIS.name: HYPNOSIS
HYPNOSIS.description:
A hypnotizing move that
may induce sleep.

MEDITATE.name: MEDITATE
MEDITATE.description:
Meditates in a peaceful
fashion to raise ATTACK.

AGILITY.name: AGILITY
AGILITY.description:
Relaxes the body to sharply
boost SPEED.

QUICK_ATTACK.name: QUICK ATTACK
QUICK_ATTACK.description:
An extremely fast attack
that always strikes first.

RAGE.name: RAGE
RAGE.description:
Raises the user's ATTACK
every time it is hit.

TELEPORT.name: TELEPORT
TELEPORT.description:
A psychic move for fleeing
from battle instantly.

NIGHT_SHADE.name: NIGHT SHADE
NIGHT_SHADE.description:
Inflicts damage identical
to the user's level.

MIMIC.name: MIMIC
MIMIC.description:
Copies a move used by the
foe during one battle.

SCREECH.name: SCREECH
SCREECH.description:
Emits a screech to sharply
reduce the foe's DEFENSE.

DOUBLE_TEAM.name: DOUBLE TEAM
DOUBLE_TEAM.description:
Creates illusory copies to
raise evasiveness.

RECOVER.name: RECOVER
RECOVER.description:
Recovers up to half the
user's maximum HP.

HARDEN.name: HARDEN
HARDEN.description:
Stiffens the body's 
muscles to raise DEFENSE.

MINIMIZE.name: MINIMIZE
MINIMIZE.description:
Minimizes the user's size
to raise evasiveness.

SMOKESCREEN.name: SMOKESCREEN
SMOKESCREEN.description:
Lowers the foe's accuracy
using smoke, ink, etc.

CONFUSE_RAY.name: CONFUSE RAY
CONFUSE_RAY.description:
A sinister ray that
confuses the foe.

WITHDRAW.name: WITHDRAW
WITHDRAW.description:
Withdraws the body into its
hard shell to raise DEFENSE.

DEFENSE_CURL.name: DEFENSE CURL
DEFENSE_CURL.description:
Curls up to conceal weak
spots and raise DEFENSE.

BARRIER.name: BARRIER
BARRIER.description:
Creates a barrier that
sharply raises DEFENSE.

LIGHT_SCREEN.name: LIGHT SCREEN
LIGHT_SCREEN.description:
Creates a wall of light that
lowers SP. ATK damage.

HAZE.name: HAZE
HAZE.description:
Creates a black haze that
eliminates all stat changes.

REFLECT.name: REFLECT
REFLECT.description:
Creates a wall of light that
weakens physical attacks.

FOCUS_ENERGY.name: FOCUS ENERGY
FOCUS_ENERGY.description:
Focuses power to raise the
critical-hit ratio.

BIDE.name: BIDE
BIDE.description:
Endures attack for 2
turns to retaliate double.

METRONOME.name: METRONOME
METRONOME.description:
Waggles a finger to use any
POKéMON move at random.

MIRROR_MOVE.name: MIRROR MOVE
MIRROR_MOVE.description:
Counters the foe's attack
with the same move.

SELF_DESTRUCT.name: SELFDESTRUCT
SELF_DESTRUCT.description:
Inflicts severe damage but
makes the user faint.

EGG_BOMB.name: EGG BOMB
EGG_BOMB.description:
An egg is forcibly hurled at
the foe.

LICK.name: LICK
LICK.description:
Licks with a long tongue to
injure. May also paralyze.

SMOG.name: SMOG
SMOG.description:
An exhaust-gas attack
that may also poison.

SLUDGE.name: SLUDGE
SLUDGE.description:
Sludge is hurled to inflict
damage. May also poison.

BONE_CLUB.name: BONE CLUB
BONE_CLUB.description:
Clubs the foe with a bone.
May cause flinching.

FIRE_BLAST.name: FIRE BLAST
FIRE_BLAST.description:
Incinerates everything it
strikes. May cause a burn.

WATERFALL.name: WATERFALL
WATERFALL.description:
Charges the foe with speed
to climb waterfalls.

CLAMP.name: CLAMP
CLAMP.description:
Traps and squeezes the
foe for 2 to 5 turns.

SWIFT.name: SWIFT
SWIFT.description:
Sprays star-shaped rays
that never miss.

SKULL_BASH.name: SKULL BASH
SKULL_BASH.description:
Tucks in the head, then
attacks on the next turn.

SPIKE_CANNON.name: SPIKE CANNON
SPIKE_CANNON.description:
Launches sharp spikes that
strike 2 to 5 times.

CONSTRICT.name: CONSTRICT
CONSTRICT.description:
Constricts to inflict pain.
May lower SPEED.

AMNESIA.name: AMNESIA
AMNESIA.description:
Forgets about something
and sharply raises SP. DEF.

KINESIS.name: KINESIS
KINESIS.description:
Distracts the foe.
May lower accuracy.

SOFT_BOILED.name: SOFTBOILED
SOFT_BOILED.description:
Recovers up to half the
user's maximum HP.

HI_JUMP_KICK.name: HI JUMP KICK
HI_JUMP_KICK.description:
A jumping knee kick. If it
misses, the user is hurt.

GLARE.name: GLARE
GLARE.description:
Intimidates and frightens
the foe into paralysis.

DREAM_EATER.name: DREAM EATER
DREAM_EATER.description:
Takes one half the damage
inflicted on a sleeping foe.

POISON_GAS.name: POISON GAS
POISON_GAS.description:
Envelops the foe in a toxic
gas that may poison.

BARRAGE.name: BARRAGE
BARRAGE.description:
Hurls round objects at the
foe 2 to 5 times.

LEECH_LIFE.name: LEECH LIFE
LEECH_LIFE.description:
An attack that steals half
the damage inflicted.

LOVELY_KISS.name: LOVELY KISS
LOVELY_KISS.description:
Demands a kiss with a scary
face that induces sleep.

SKY_ATTACK.name: SKY ATTACK
SKY_ATTACK.description:
Searches out weak spots,
then strikes the next turn.

TRANSFORM.name: TRANSFORM
TRANSFORM.description:
Alters the user's cells to
become a copy of the foe.

BUBBLE.name: BUBBLE
BUBBLE.description:
An attack using bubbles.
May lower the foe's SPEED.

DIZZY_PUNCH.name: DIZZY PUNCH
DIZZY_PUNCH.description:
A rhythmic punch that may
confuse the foe.

SPORE.name: SPORE
SPORE.description:
Scatters a cloud of spores
that always induce sleep.

FLASH.name: FLASH
FLASH.description:
Looses a powerful blast of
light that cuts accuracy.

PSYWAVE.name: PSYWAVE
PSYWAVE.description:
Attacks with a psychic
wave of varying intensity.

SPLASH.name: SPLASH
SPLASH.description:
It's just a splash...
Has no effect whatsoever.

ACID_ARMOR.name: ACID ARMOR
ACID_ARMOR.description:
Liquifies the user's body
to sharply raise DEFENSE.

CRABHAMMER.name: CRABHAMMER
CRABHAMMER.description:
Hammers with a pincer. Has a
high critical-hit ratio.

EXPLOSION.name: EXPLOSION
EXPLOSION.description:
Inflicts severe damage but
makes the user faint.

FURY_SWIPES.name: FURY SWIPES
FURY_SWIPES.description:
Rakes the foe with sharp
claws, etc., 2 to 5 times.

BONEMERANG.name: BONEMERANG
BONEMERANG.description:
Throws a bone boomerang
that strikes twice.

REST.name: REST
REST.description:
The user sleeps for 2 turns,
restoring HP and status.

ROCK_SLIDE.name: ROCK SLIDE
ROCK_SLIDE.description:
Large boulders are hurled.
May cause flinching.

HYPER_FANG.name: HYPER FANG
HYPER_FANG.description:
Attacks with sharp fangs.
May cause flinching.

SHARPEN.name: SHARPEN
SHARPEN.description:
Reduces the polygon count
and raises ATTACK.

CONVERSION.name: CONVERSION
CONVERSION.description:
Changes the user's type
into a known move's type.

TRI_ATTACK.name: TRI ATTACK
TRI_ATTACK.description:
Fires three types of beams
at the same time.

SUPER_FANG.name: SUPER FANG
SUPER_FANG.description:
Attacks with sharp fangs
and cuts half the foe's HP.

SLASH.name: SLASH
SLASH.description:
Slashes with claws, etc. Has
a high critical-hit ratio.

SUBSTITUTE.name: SUBSTITUTE
SUBSTITUTE.description:
Creates a decoy using 1/4
of the user's maximum HP.

STRUGGLE.name: STRUGGLE
STRUGGLE.description:
Used only if all PP are gone.
Also hurts the user a little.

SKETCH.name: SKETCH
SKETCH.description:
Copies the foe's last move
permanently.

TRIPLE_KICK.name: TRIPLE KICK
TRIPLE_KICK.description:
Kicks the foe 3 times in a
row with rising intensity.

THIEF.name: THIEF
THIEF.description:
While attacking, it may
steal the foe's held item.

SPIDER_WEB.name: SPIDER WEB
SPIDER_WEB.description:
Ensnares the foe to stop it
from fleeing or switching.

MIND_READER.name: MIND READER
MIND_READER.description:
Senses the foe's action to
ensure the next move's hit.

NIGHTMARE.name: NIGHTMARE
NIGHTMARE.description:
Inflicts 1/4 damage on a
sleeping foe every turn.

FLAME_WHEEL.name: FLAME WHEEL
FLAME_WHEEL.description:
A fiery charge attack that
may inflict a burn.

SNORE.name: SNORE
SNORE.description:
A loud attack that can be
used only while asleep.

CURSE.name: CURSE
CURSE.description:
A move that functions
differently for GHOSTS.

FLAIL.name: FLAIL
FLAIL.description:
Inflicts more damage when
the user's HP is down.

CONVERSION_2.name: CONVERSION 2
CONVERSION_2.description:
Makes the user resistant
to the last attack's type.

AEROBLAST.name: AEROBLAST
AEROBLAST.description:
Launches a vacuumed blast.
High critical-hit ratio.

COTTON_SPORE.name: COTTON SPORE
COTTON_SPORE.description:
Spores cling to the foe,
sharply reducing SPEED.

REVERSAL.name: REVERSAL
REVERSAL.description:
Inflicts more damage when
the user's HP is down.

SPITE.name: SPITE
SPITE.description:
Spitefully cuts the PP
of the foe's last move.

POWDER_SNOW.name: POWDER SNOW
POWDER_SNOW.description:
Blasts the foe with a snowy
gust. May cause freezing.

PROTECT.name: PROTECT
PROTECT.description:
Evades attack, but may fail
if used in succession.

MACH_PUNCH.name: MACH PUNCH
MACH_PUNCH.description:
A punch is thrown at wicked
speed to strike first.

SCARY_FACE.name: SCARY FACE
SCARY_FACE.description:
Frightens with a scary face
to sharply reduce SPEED.

FAINT_ATTACK.name: FAINT ATTACK
FAINT_ATTACK.description:
Draws the foe close, then
strikes without fail.

SWEET_KISS.name: SWEET KISS
SWEET_KISS.description:
Demands a kiss with a cute
look. May cause confusion.

SLUDGE_BOMB.name: SLUDGE BOMB
SLUDGE_BOMB.description:
Sludge is hurled to inflict
damage. May also poison.

MUD_SLAP.name: MUD-SLAP
MUD_SLAP.description:
Hurls mud in the foe's face
to reduce its accuracy.

OCTAZOOKA.name: OCTAZOOKA
OCTAZOOKA.description:
Fires a lump of ink to
damage and cut accuracy.

SPIKES.name: SPIKES
SPIKES.description:
Sets spikes that hurt a 
foe switching in.

ZAP_CANNON.name: ZAP CANNON
ZAP_CANNON.description:
Powerful and sure to cause
paralysis, but inaccurate.

FORESIGHT.name: FORESIGHT
FORESIGHT.description:
Negates the foe's efforts
to heighten evasiveness.

DESTINY_BOND.name: DESTINY BOND
DESTINY_BOND.description:
If the user faints, the foe
is also made to faint.

PERISH_SONG.name: PERISH SONG
PERISH_SONG.description:
Any POKéMON hearing this
song faints in 3 turns.

ICY_WIND.name: ICY WIND
ICY_WIND.description:
A chilling attack that
lowers the foe's SPEED.

DETECT.name: DETECT
DETECT.description:
Evades attack, but may fail
if used in succession.

BONE_RUSH.name: BONE RUSH
BONE_RUSH.description:
Strikes the foe with a bone
in hand 2 to 5 times.

LOCK_ON.name: LOCK-ON
LOCK_ON.description:
Locks on to the foe to
ensure the next move hits.

OUTRAGE.name: OUTRAGE
OUTRAGE.description:
A rampage of 2 to 3 turns
that confuses the user.

SANDSTORM.name: SANDSTORM
SANDSTORM.description:
Causes a sandstorm that
rages for several turns.

GIGA_DRAIN.name: GIGA DRAIN
GIGA_DRAIN.description:
An attack that steals half
the damage inflicted.

ENDURE.name: ENDURE
ENDURE.description:
Endures any attack for
1 turn, leaving at least 1HP.

CHARM.name: CHARM
CHARM.description:
Charms the foe and sharply
reduces its ATTACK.

ROLLOUT.name: ROLLOUT
ROLLOUT.description:
An attack lasting 5 turns
with rising intensity.

FALSE_SWIPE.name: FALSE SWIPE
FALSE_SWIPE.description:
An attack that leaves the
foe with at least 1 HP.

SWAGGER.name: SWAGGER
SWAGGER.description:
Confuses the foe, but also
sharply raises ATTACK.

MILK_DRINK.name: MILK DRINK
MILK_DRINK.description:
Recovers up to half the
user's maximum HP.

SPARK.name: SPARK
SPARK.description:
An electrified tackle that
may paralyze the foe.

FURY_CUTTER.name: FURY CUTTER
FURY_CUTTER.description:
An attack that intensifies
on each successive hit.

STEEL_WING.name: STEEL WING
STEEL_WING.description:
Strikes the foe with hard
wings spread wide.

MEAN_LOOK.name: MEAN LOOK
MEAN_LOOK.description:
Fixes the foe with a mean
look that prevents escape.

ATTRACT.name: ATTRACT
ATTRACT.description:
Makes the opposite gender
less likely to attack.

SLEEP_TALK.name: SLEEP TALK
SLEEP_TALK.description:
Uses an available move
randomly while asleep.

HEAL_BELL.name: HEAL BELL
HEAL_BELL.description:
Chimes soothingly to heal
all status abnormalities.

RETURN.name: RETURN
RETURN.description:
An attack that increases
in power with friendship.

PRESENT.name: PRESENT
PRESENT.description:
A gift in the form of a
bomb. May restore HP.

FRUSTRATION.name: FRUSTRATION
FRUSTRATION.description:
An attack that is stronger
if the TRAINER is disliked.

SAFEGUARD.name: SAFEGUARD
SAFEGUARD.description:
A mystical force prevents
all status problems.

PAIN_SPLIT.name: PAIN SPLIT
PAIN_SPLIT.description:
Adds the user and foe's HP,
then shares them equally.

SACRED_FIRE.name: SACRED FIRE
SACRED_FIRE.description:
A mystical fire attack that
may inflict a burn.

MAGNITUDE.name: MAGNITUDE
MAGNITUDE.description:
A ground-shaking attack
of random intensity.

DYNAMIC_PUNCH.name: DYNAMICPUNCH
DYNAMIC_PUNCH.description:
Powerful and sure to cause
confusion, but inaccurate.

MEGAHORN.name: MEGAHORN
MEGAHORN.description:
A brutal ramming attack
using out-thrust horns.

DRAGON_BREATH.name: DRAGONBREATH
DRAGON_BREATH.description:
Strikes the foe with an
incredible blast of breath.

BATON_PASS.name: BATON PASS
BATON_PASS.description:
Switches out the user while
keeping effects in play.

ENCORE.name: ENCORE
ENCORE.description:
Makes the foe repeat its
last move over 2 to 6 turns.

PURSUIT.name: PURSUIT
PURSUIT.description:
Inflicts bad damage if used
on a foe switching out.

RAPID_SPIN.name: RAPID SPIN
RAPID_SPIN.description:
Spins the body at high
speed to strike the foe.

SWEET_SCENT.name: SWEET SCENT
SWEET_SCENT.description:
Allures the foe to reduce
evasiveness.

IRON_TAIL.name: IRON TAIL
IRON_TAIL.description:
Attacks with a rock-hard
tail. May lower DEFENSE.

METAL_CLAW.name: METAL CLAW
METAL_CLAW.description:
A claw attack that may
raise the user's ATTACK.

VITAL_THROW.name: VITAL THROW
VITAL_THROW.description:
Makes the user's move last,
but it never misses.

MORNING_SUN.name: MORNING SUN
MORNING_SUN.description:
Restores HP. The amount
varies with the weather.

SYNTHESIS.name: SYNTHESIS
SYNTHESIS.description:
Restores HP. The amount
varies with the weather.

MOONLIGHT.name: MOONLIGHT
MOONLIGHT.description:
Restores HP. The amount
varies with the weather.

HIDDEN_POWER.name: HIDDEN POWER
HIDDEN_POWER.description:
The effectiveness varies
with the user.

CROSS_CHOP.name: CROSS CHOP
CROSS_CHOP.description:
A double-chopping attack.
High critical-hit ratio.

TWISTER.name: TWISTER
TWISTER.description:
Whips up a vicious twister
to tear at the foe.

RAIN_DANCE.name: RAIN DANCE
RAIN_DANCE.description:
Boosts the power of WATER-
type moves for 5 turns.

SUNNY_DAY.name: SUNNY DAY
SUNNY_DAY.description:
Boosts the power of FIRE-
type moves for 5 turns.

CRUNCH.name: CRUNCH
CRUNCH.description:
Crunches with sharp fangs.
May lower SP. DEF.

MIRROR_COAT.name: MIRROR COAT
MIRROR_COAT.description:
Counters the foe's special
attack at double the power.

PSYCH_UP.name: PSYCH UP
PSYCH_UP.description:
Copies the foe's effect(s)
and gives to the user.

EXTREME_SPEED.name: EXTREMESPEED
EXTREME_SPEED.description:
An extremely fast and
powerful attack.

ANCIENT_POWER.name: ANCIENTPOWER
ANCIENT_POWER.description:
An attack that may raise
all stats.

SHADOW_BALL.name: SHADOW BALL
SHADOW_BALL.description:
Hurls a black blob that may
lower the foe's SP. DEF.

FUTURE_SIGHT.name: FUTURE SIGHT
FUTURE_SIGHT.description:
Heightens inner power to
strike 2 turns later.

ROCK_SMASH.name: ROCK SMASH
ROCK_SMASH.description:
A rock-crushing attack
that may lower DEFENSE.

WHIRLPOOL.name: WHIRLPOOL
WHIRLPOOL.description:
Traps and hurts the foe in
a whirlpool for 2 to 5 turns.

BEAT_UP.name: BEAT UP
BEAT_UP.description:
Summons party POKéMON to
join in the attack.

UPROAR.name: UPROAR
UPROAR.description:
Causes an uproar for 2 to 5
turns and prevents sleep.

STOCKPILE.name: STOCKPILE
STOCKPILE.description:
Charges up power for up to
3 turns.

SPIT_UP.name: SPIT UP
SPIT_UP.description:
Releases stockpiled power
(the more the better).

SWALLOW.name: SWALLOW
SWALLOW.description:
Absorbs stockpiled power
and restores HP.

HEAT_WAVE.name: HEAT WAVE
HEAT_WAVE.description:
Exhales a hot breath on the
foe. May inflict a burn.

HAIL.name: HAIL
HAIL.description:
Summons a hailstorm that
strikes every turn.

TORMENT.name: TORMENT
TORMENT.description:
Torments the foe and stops
successive use of a move.

FLATTER.name: FLATTER
FLATTER.description:
Confuses the foe, but
raises its SP. ATK.

WILL_O_WISP.name: WILL-O-WISP
WILL_O_WISP.description:
Inflicts a burn on the foe
with intense fire.

MEMENTO.name: MEMENTO
MEMENTO.description:
The user faints and lowers
the foe's abilities.

FACADE.name: FACADE
FACADE.description:
Boosts ATTACK when burned,
paralyzed, or poisoned.

FOCUS_PUNCH.name: FOCUS PUNCH
FOCUS_PUNCH.description:
A powerful loyalty attack.
The user flinches if hit.

SMELLING_SALT.name: SMELLINGSALT
SMELLING_SALT.description:
Powerful against paralyzed
foes, but also heals them.

FOLLOW_ME.name: FOLLOW ME
FOLLOW_ME.description:
Draws attention to make
foes attack only the user.

NATURE_POWER.name: NATURE POWER
NATURE_POWER.description:
The type of attack varies
depending on the location.

CHARGE.name: CHARGE
CHARGE.description:
Charges power to boost the
electric move used next.

TAUNT.name: TAUNT
TAUNT.description:
Taunts the foe into only
using attack moves.

HELPING_HAND.name: HELPING HAND
HELPING_HAND.description:
Boosts the power of the
recipient's moves.

TRICK.name: TRICK
TRICK.description:
Tricks the foe into trading
held items.

ROLE_PLAY.name: ROLE PLAY
ROLE_PLAY.description:
Mimics the target and
copies its special ability.

WISH.name: WISH
WISH.description:
A wish that restores HP.
It takes time to work.

ASSIST.name: ASSIST
ASSIST.description:
Attacks randomly with one
of the partner's moves.

INGRAIN.name: INGRAIN
INGRAIN.description:
Lays roots that restore HP.
The user can't switch out.

SUPERPOWER.name: SUPERPOWER
SUPERPOWER.description:
Boosts strength sharply,
but lowers abilities.

MAGIC_COAT.name: MAGIC COAT
MAGIC_COAT.description:
Reflects special effects
back to the attacker.

RECYCLE.name: RECYCLE
RECYCLE.description:
Recycles a used item for
one more use.

REVENGE.name: REVENGE
REVENGE.description:
An attack that gains power
if injured by the foe.

BRICK_BREAK.name: BRICK BREAK
BRICK_BREAK.description:
Destroys barriers such as
REFLECT and causes damage.

YAWN.name: YAWN
YAWN.description:
Lulls the foe into yawning,
then sleeping next turn.

KNOCK_OFF.name: KNOCK OFF
KNOCK_OFF.description:
Knocks down the foe's held
item to prevent its use.

ENDEAVOR.name: ENDEAVOR
ENDEAVOR.description:
Gains power if the user's HP
is lower than the foe's HP.

ERUPTION.name: ERUPTION
ERUPTION.description:
The higher the user's HP,
the more damage caused.

SKILL_SWAP.name: SKILL SWAP
SKILL_SWAP.description:
The user swaps special
abilities with the target.

IMPRISON.name: IMPRISON
IMPRISON.description:
Prevents foes from using
moves known by the user.

REFRESH.name: REFRESH
REFRESH.description:
Heals poisoning, paralysis,
or a burn.

GRUDGE.name: GRUDGE
GRUDGE.description:
If the user faints, deletes
all PP of foe's last move.

SNATCH.name: SNATCH
SNATCH.description:
Steals the effects of the
move the target uses next.

SECRET_POWER.name: SECRET POWER
SECRET_POWER.description:
An attack with effects
that vary by location.

DIVE.name: DIVE
DIVE.description:
Dives underwater the first
turn and strikes next turn.

ARM_THRUST.name: ARM THRUST
ARM_THRUST.description:
Straight-arm punches that
strike the foe 2 to 5 times.

CAMOUFLAGE.name: CAMOUFLAGE
CAMOUFLAGE.description:
Alters the POKéMON's type
depending on the location.

TAIL_GLOW.name: TAIL GLOW
TAIL_GLOW.description:
Flashes a light that sharply
raises SP. ATK.

LUSTER_PURGE.name: LUSTER PURGE
LUSTER_PURGE.description:
Attacks with a burst of
light. May lower SP. DEF.

MIST_BALL.name: MIST BALL
MIST_BALL.description:
Attacks with a flurry of
down. May lower SP. ATK.

FEATHER_DANCE.name: FEATHERDANCE
FEATHER_DANCE.description:
Envelops the foe with down
to sharply reduce ATTACK.

TEETER_DANCE.name: TEETER DANCE
TEETER_DANCE.description:
Confuses all POKéMON on
the scene.

BLAZE_KICK.name: BLAZE KICK
BLAZE_KICK.description:
A kick with a high critical-
hit ratio. May cause a burn.

MUD_SPORT.name: MUD SPORT
MUD_SPORT.description:
Covers the user in mud to
raise electrical resistance.

ICE_BALL.name: ICE BALL
ICE_BALL.description:
A 5-turn attack that gains
power on successive hits.

NEEDLE_ARM.name: NEEDLE ARM
NEEDLE_ARM.description:
Attacks with thorny arms.
May cause flinching.

SLACK_OFF.name: SLACK OFF
SLACK_OFF.description:
Slacks off and restores
half the maximum HP.

HYPER_VOICE.name: HYPER VOICE
HYPER_VOICE.description:
A loud attack that uses
sound waves to injure.

POISON_FANG.name: POISON FANG
POISON_FANG.description:
A sharp-fanged attack.
May badly poison the foe.

CRUSH_CLAW.name: CRUSH CLAW
CRUSH_CLAW.description:
Tears at the foe with sharp
claws. May lower DEFENSE.

BLAST_BURN.name: BLAST BURN
BLAST_BURN.description:
Powerful, but leaves the
user immobile the next turn.

HYDRO_CANNON.name: HYDRO CANNON
HYDRO_CANNON.description:
Powerful, but leaves the
user immobile the next turn.

METEOR_MASH.name: METEOR MASH
METEOR_MASH.description:
Fires a meteor-like punch.
May raise ATTACK.

ASTONISH.name: ASTONISH
ASTONISH.description:
An attack that may shock
the foe into flinching.

WEATHER_BALL.name: WEATHER BALL
WEATHER_BALL.description:
The move's type and power
change with the weather.

AROMATHERAPY.name: AROMATHERAPY
AROMATHERAPY.description:
Heals all status problems
with a soothing scent.

FAKE_TEARS.name: FAKE TEARS
FAKE_TEARS.description:
Feigns crying to sharply
lower the foe's SP. DEF.

AIR_CUTTER.name: AIR CUTTER
AIR_CUTTER.description:
Hacks with razorlike wind.
High critical-hit ratio.

OVERHEAT.name: OVERHEAT
OVERHEAT.description:
Allows a full-power attack,
but sharply lowers SP. ATK.

ODOR_SLEUTH.name: ODOR SLEUTH
ODOR_SLEUTH.description:
Negates the foe's efforts
to heighten evasiveness.

ROCK_TOMB.name: ROCK TOMB
ROCK_TOMB.description:
Stops the foe from moving
with rocks and cuts SPEED.

SILVER_WIND.name: SILVER WIND
SILVER_WIND.description:
A powdery attack that may
raise abilities.

METAL_SOUND.name: METAL SOUND
METAL_SOUND.description:
Emits a horrible screech
that sharply lowers SP. DEF.

GRASS_WHISTLE.name: GRASSWHISTLE
GRASS_WHISTLE.description:
Lulls the foe into sleep
with a pleasant melody.

TICKLE.name: TICKLE
TICKLE.description:
Makes the foe laugh to
lower ATTACK and DEFENSE.

COSMIC_POWER.name: COSMIC POWER
COSMIC_POWER.description:
Raises DEFENSE and SP. DEF
with a mystic power.

WATER_SPOUT.name: WATER SPOUT
WATER_SPOUT.description:
Inflicts more damage if the
user's HP is high.

SIGNAL_BEAM.name: SIGNAL BEAM
SIGNAL_BEAM.description:
A strange beam attack that
may confuse the foe.

SHADOW_PUNCH.name: SHADOW PUNCH
SHADOW_PUNCH.description:
An unavoidable punch that
is thrown from shadows.

EXTRASENSORY.name: EXTRASENSORY
EXTRASENSORY.description:
Attacks with a peculiar
power. May cause flinching.

SKY_UPPERCUT.name: SKY UPPERCUT
SKY_UPPERCUT.description:
An uppercut thrown as if
leaping into the sky.

SAND_TOMB.name: SAND TOMB
SAND_TOMB.description:
Traps and hurts the foe in
quicksand for 2 to 5 turns.

SHEER_COLD.name: SHEER COLD
SHEER_COLD.description:
A chilling attack that
causes fainting if it hits.

MUDDY_WATER.name: MUDDY WATER
MUDDY_WATER.description:
Attacks with muddy water.
May lower accuracy.

BULLET_SEED.name: BULLET SEED
BULLET_SEED.description:
Shoots 2 to 5 seeds in a row
to strike the foe.

AERIAL_ACE.name: AERIAL ACE
AERIAL_ACE.description:
An extremely speedy and
unavoidable attack.

ICICLE_SPEAR.name: ICICLE SPEAR
ICICLE_SPEAR.description:
Attacks the foe by firing
2 to 5 icicles in a row.

IRON_DEFENSE.name: IRON DEFENSE
IRON_DEFENSE.description:
Hardens the body's surface
to sharply raise DEFENSE.

BLOCK.name: BLOCK
BLOCK.description:
Blocks the foe's way to
prevent escape.

HOWL.name: HOWL
HOWL.description:
Howls to raise the spirit
and boosts ATTACK.

DRAGON_CLAW.name: DRAGON CLAW
DRAGON_CLAW.description:
Slashes the foe with sharp
claws.

FRENZY_PLANT.name: FRENZY PLANT
FRENZY_PLANT.description:
Powerful, but leaves the
user immobile the next turn.

BULK_UP.name: BULK UP
BULK_UP.description:
Bulks up the body to boost
both ATTACK and DEFENSE.

BOUNCE.name: BOUNCE
BOUNCE.description:
Bounces up, then down the
next turn. May paralyze.

MUD_SHOT.name: MUD SHOT
MUD_SHOT.description:
Hurls mud at the foe and
reduces SPEED.

POISON_TAIL.name: POISON TAIL
POISON_TAIL.description:
Has a high critical-hit
ratio. May also poison.

COVET.name: COVET
COVET.description:
Cutely begs to obtain an
item held by the foe.

VOLT_TACKLE.name: VOLT TACKLE
VOLT_TACKLE.description:
A life-risking tackle that
slightly hurts the user.

MAGICAL_LEAF.name: MAGICAL LEAF
MAGICAL_LEAF.description:
Attacks with a strange leaf
that cannot be evaded.

WATER_SPORT.name: WATER SPORT
WATER_SPORT.description:
The user becomes soaked to
raise resistance to fire.

CALM_MIND.name: CALM MIND
CALM_MIND.description:
Raises SP. ATK and SP. DEF
by focusing the mind.

LEAF_BLADE.name: LEAF BLADE
LEAF_BLADE.description:
Slashes with a sharp leaf.
High critical-hit ratio.

DRAGON_DANCE.name: DRAGON DANCE
DRAGON_DANCE.description:
A mystical dance that ups
ATTACK and SPEED.

ROCK_BLAST.name: ROCK BLAST
ROCK_BLAST.description:
Hurls boulders at the foe
2 to 5 times in a row.

SHOCK_WAVE.name: SHOCK WAVE
SHOCK_WAVE.description:
A fast and unavoidable
electric attack.

WATER_PULSE.name: WATER PULSE
WATER_PULSE.description:
Attacks with ultrasonic
waves. May confuse the foe.

DOOM_DESIRE.name: DOOM DESIRE
DOOM_DESIRE.description:
Summons strong sunlight to
attack 2 turns later.

PSYCHO_BOOST.name: PSYCHO BOOST
PSYCHO_BOOST.description:
Allows a full-power attack,
but sharply lowers SP. ATK.
